name: SkyWeaver
description:
NOTE: To join the SkyWeaver playtest and get early access, sign up to our early access waitlist to be in line to receive a code and help test the game at: https://skyweaver.net/signup.

Pioneer a new digital dimension called Sky. Become a SkyWeaver.

SkyWeaver is a free-to-play card game that unifies the best aspects of online and real-world trading card games. SkyWeaver cards are truly yours: you can earn, trade, or give them away — just like physical cards.
